body_html: Will it have builtin supporting for padding sequences of different length? This is easy to do in the one-directional case but the bidirectional case has to flip the padding and align the activations of the shorter sequences.
body_text: Will it have builtin supporting for padding sequences of different length? This is easy to do in the one-directional case but the bidirectional case has to flip the padding and align the activations of the shorter sequences.
body: Will it have builtin supporting for padding sequences of different length? This is easy to do in the one-directional case but the bidirectional case has to flip the padding and align the activations of the shorter sequences.
